abstract: Huang Hongru steps down as executive of district in southern China after video of law enforcement officers beating women and at least one child goes viral, prompting widespread criticism; had overseen demolition project in region.

headline.print_headline: Officials Punished Over Film of Beatings
headline.main: Video of Beatings Amid Demolition in China Leads to Punishments

snippet: One person resigned and two were dismissed after footage showing law enforcement officers beating women and at least one child circulated on social media.
lead_paragraph: One person resigned and two were dismissed after footage showing law enforcement officers beating women and at least one child circulated on social media.
